description: Identifier of the parts kit this detail line belongs to; links to the parent kit record used for grouped parts in maintenance or repairs.
Inventory part number for the item included in the kit; may be an internal stock code or vendor/manufacturer number.
Line sequence within the kit, controlling display, pick order, or assembly steps.
Free-text description of the stock item, including key specifications.
Quantity of the item required per kit, used for planning and costing.
Cost per unit of the item for this kit line; likely sourced from inventory valuation or last purchase price; confirm with SME.
Extended line cost for this kit item (quantity Ã— unit cost); typically calculated for kit costing.
User ID that created the kit detail line for audit purposes.
Timestamp when the kit detail line was created.
User ID that last updated the kit detail line.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the kit detail line.
Code of the warehouse or location associated with this kit line (default stocking or pick location); confirm business rules with SME.
